full_content:
### 编写最简单的服务

#### 编写test.lua文件

local skynet = require "skynet"

skynet.start(function()
   skynet.error("最简单的服务")
end)


### 启动服务


#### 编写test_config配置文件

-- 搜索路径配置
root = "./"
luaservice = root .. "service/?.lua;" .. root .. "project/?.lua"
lualoader = root .. "lualib/loader.lua"
lua_path = root .. "lualib/?.lua;" .. root .. "lualib/?/init.lua"
lua_cpath = root .. "luaclib/?.so"

--基本参数配置
thread = 8
logger = nil
harbor = 1
address = "127.0.0.1:2606"
master = "127.0.0.1:2024"

--启动test服务
start = "test"
bootstrap = "snlua bootstrap"
standalone = "0.0.0.0:2024"
cpath = root .. "cservice/?.so"

#### 执行配置文件启动服务

在linux终端执行如下命令：
    ./skynet test_config
 
 执行成功后终端会打印如下信息：
      [:01000002] LAUNCH snlua bootstrap
      [:01000003] LAUNCH snlua launcher
      [:01000004] LAUNCH snlua cmaster
      [:01000004] master listen socket 0.0.0.0:2024
      [:01000005] LAUNCH snlua cslave
      [:01000005] slave connect to master 127.0.0.1:2024
      [:01000004] connect from 127.0.0.1:47116 4
      [:01000006] LAUNCH harbor 1 16777221
      [:01000004] Harbor 1 (fd=4) report 127.0.0.1:2526
      [:01000005] Waiting for 0 harbors
      [:01000005] Shakehand ready
      [:01000007] LAUNCH snlua datacenterd
      [:01000008] LAUNCH snlua service_mgr
      [:01000009] LAUNCH snlua test
      [:01000009] 创建最简单的服务
      [:01000002] KILL self
